namespaces.namespace: The core classes and interfaces for working with NHibernate.
The classes and interfaces that make up the second-level cache.
The classes used to configure an NHibernate ISession and ISessionFactory.
The classes that implement IList<>, IDictionary<>, and ISet<> and the Persister to read/write to the database.
The classes and interfaces that NHibernate uses to get connections to the database.
The classes and interfaces that NHibernate uses to create SQL Statements that conform to the particular database.
The classes and interfaces that NHibernate uses to interface with the various .NET Data Providers.
The classes and interfaces that NHibernate uses internally.
The classes and interfaces to use for building Queries in an OO style.
The classes and interfaces o the event framework for NHibernate..
The classes and interfaces that are used to parse Queries in the form of HQL.
The classes and interfaces that define how NHibernate generates or retreives generated ids.
The classes that implement many of the internal NHibernate interfaces.
The classes and interfaces that define how NHibernate loads data from the database.
The classes that the hbm.xml files are converted to during Configuration.
The interfaces to use to retrieve information about Classes and Collections that NHibernate is managing.
The classes and interfaces that NHibernate uses to persist objects.
The classes and interfaces that NHibernate uses to get/set values in the objects.
The classes that NHibernate uses to build Sql Statements for the Drivers & Dialects to convert to SQL.
The classes that NHibernate uses to add extra information to DbTypes.
Exposes statistics about a running NHibernate instance to the application.
The classes that NHibernate uses to build ddl from the mapped classes.
The classes and interfaces that NHibernate uses to manage transactions.
The classes and interfaces that NHibernate uses to convert .NET objects to database values.
Utility classes that NHibernate uses through out.
